Queries.CheckTableExists: SELECT name FROM sqlite_master WHERE type='table' AND name=@tableName;
Queries.ViewAllRecords: SELECT id, startTime, endTime, duration FROM coding_sessions
Queries.GetTotalTimeSpentCoding: SELECT SUM(duration) AS totalDuration FROM coding_sessions;
Queries.GetTotalNumOfCodingSessions: SELECT COUNT(Id) AS totalCount FROM coding_sessions;
Queries.GetTotalTimeSpentCodingWithinATimePeriod: SELECT SUM(duration) AS totalDuration FROM coding_sessions WHERE startTime>=@StartTime AND endTime<=@EndTime;
Queries.GetTotalNumOfCodingSessionsWithinATimePe: SELECT COUNT(Id) AS totalCount FROM coding_sessions WHERE startTime>=@StartTime AND endTime<=@EndTime;
Queries.GetTotalNumOfCodingSessionsForEachMonthO: SELECT CAST(strftime('%m', startTime) AS INTEGER) AS Month, COUNT(*) AS Occurrences FROM coding_sessions WHERE strftime('%Y', startTime)=@year GROUP BY strftime('%m', startTime) ORDER BY Month;

Commands.InsertRecord: INSERT INTO coding_sessions (startTime, endTime, duration) VALUES (@StartTime, @EndTime, @Duration)
Commands.UpdateRecord: UPDATE coding_sessions SET startTime = @StartTime, endTime = @EndTime, duration = @Duration WHERE id = @Id
Commands.CreateTable: CREATE TABLE coding_sessions (id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY, startTime DATE NOT NULL, endTime DATE NOT NULL, duration INT NOT NULL)
